EmailTemplate.subject: Axos Bank Change Request - Beneficiary
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
We will be happy to assist you with adding, removing or updating your beneficiaries on your account. This will be a two-step process:
Step 1: Complete the Change Request: Beneficiary form.
Step 2: Return the completed Beneficiary request forms for processing by;
Secure Message: Login to Online Banking, click on Contact Us, and send a secure email with a scanned copy of the signed documents. Fax to: 858-350-0443; or Mail to: Deposit Operations: New Accounts PO BOX 509127 San Diego, CA 92150-9948
Your Beneficiary change will be reviewed within three business days upon receipt of the Account Vesting Change form.
We appreciate your business and commit to providing superior banking products, support and services.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} Axos Bank Customer Service
